LanguageData.THU_Chestburster_SuccessMessage: As {0} screams in agony, {1} chest burst open and out pops a disgusting little snakelike creature.
LanguageData.THU_Chestburster_InHidingPlace: The chestburster has gone into hiding. Don't bother looking for it. You will hear from it soon enough...
LanguageData.THU_LetterText_ShipPart: {0} is freaked out by this ship part. It almost feels like something is alive in there.
